name: ACH_0
description: Collect your first power-up. You did? Now go and wipe them all out!

name: ACH_1
description: Retrieve a dropped message from a fellow ship in the RM fleet. There is one awaiting you just at the end of Level01!

name: ACH_2
description: Crush 10 boulders in Level04. Feels good, doesn't it... Your lasers are your friend here...

name: ACH_3
description: Get infected by the IPA virus in your first encounter with it in Level05. Oh wait, have you updated your anti-virus database? Good for you.

name: ACH_4
description: Sustain 10 seconds unharmed and without shooting against the boss IPA_IRecon in Level09. On the bright side, you get to enjoy all the lightworks!

name: ACH_5
description: Pass through the low-energy galaxy in Level10 without shooting a single bolt. It… is… so… tempting… yet…

name: ACH_6
description: The boss Shift_2LR in Level11 comes disguised behind two Mutex_3S shells. Popping one shell is easy, but are you fast enough to pop the other one too?

name: ACH_7
description: Make it unharmed through all the fleeing enemies in Level19... and prepare for what's coming next...

name: ACH_8
displayName: Red Pill or Blue Pill? Neither
description: In Level20, you may go through one of two gates: Red or Blue… Rumors say there exists yet a third green gate… it lies [beyond, beyond, beyond] the two gates. Can you discover the third green gate?

name: ACH_9
description: The final boss encounter in Level29 is a crowded one. Wipe out 30 of the small bacterial minions puffed out by IPA_DRecurse spores.

name: ACH_10
description: Defeat IPA_IRecon: the first incarnation of the virus in Level09. Now you really know the true enemy!

name: ACH_11
description: Defeat IPA_VInterface: the second incarnation of the virus in Level19. It comes back to you for vengeance. This time it will not leave you without paying a price!

name: ACH_12
description: Defeat IPA_IRecurse: the third incarnation of the virus in Level29. This is the final battle. Only one will survive!

name: ACH_13
description: Discover and collect all Secret Orbs in Hyper Void... and enjoy the level shortcuts!

name: ACH_14
description: Win all 29 levels in Hyper Mode. Be proud, you have seen each and every kilo-byte this game has to offer.
